btnActivate.description: Button text for activate the extension

txtSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the search input field

mftDescription.message: Find and organize your Chat GPT searchs.

pDescription.message:
This extension was created to assist you in searching and organizing your ChatGPT. If it has been helpful to you, please consider supporting us. All donations will go towards funding my wedding. Click the button below and make a donation of any amount. We deeply appreciate your generosity!

obs: I am working on further enhancing the extension, with the organization of searches through folders directly from the menu.

aDonate.description: A link for donate with paypal

spnDevelopedBy.description: Span with the text that pointer to who developed the extension
